name: Project Monster (Jpez1432)
description:
Project Monster is an up-and-coming open sandbox soft-body physics monster truck freestyle simulator, brought to you by SopeGames.com. You will be sitting behind the wheel of some of the most beastly machines known to man, 1500hp sitting behind your head, 66' tires below your feet, and a fury waiting to be unleashed. It allows for the modification of tracks and trucks as well as importing over 6000+ trucks from the granddaddy of them all, Monster Truck Madness 1 & 2. A truck, track, and real-time physics editor are included in the game. Drag racing is a planned feature as well as internet and LAN play. Come check it out, and keep on truckin'.

-Jpez1432

- jpez1432@gmail.com

- www.SopeGames.com

Features:

- Track Editor

- Truck Editor

- Realtime physics editing

- Soft-body physics

- Modifiable addons

-Importing 6000+ trucks from www.MTM2.com

- Unlimited possibilities

Planned Features:

- Internet/LAN play

- Drag/racing

-Content
